title: Athletism — Skiing (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Movement Quality
equipment: Gym: squat rack, platforms, barbells, dumbbells, cables
Stationary bike/Wattbike, treadmill (incline), curved sprint track
goal: Rebuild movement competency, tissue capacity, and asymmetry correction ahead of load.

warmup: Activation 8–10' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Landing mechanics: snap-downs, pogos, lateral snap-downs
main: Strength (full): Back Squat 4x6 @RPE6, RDL 3x8, Split Squat 3x8/leg
Core anti-rotation: Pallof press 4x12/side + farmer carry 3x30m
Bike Z2 35–45' or tempo run 20' (soft surface)

notes: Week 1: Volume foundation (Z1–Z2 bike 30–40' 2x). Week 2: +10% volume; add controlled eccentrics (3–4s).
